procurement.typeofprocurement: Procurement of Office Furniture with ITB No. PRO IX 2015-002 (O.F.)

authority.name: Republic of the Philippines Government Procurement Policy Board

sanction.legalgrounds: Contractor falsified the technical documents submitted for single largest completed contract entered into between the Local Government Unit of Zamboanga City in order to influence the outcome of the eligibility screening during the conduct of competitive bidding for the Procurement of Office Furniture

0000000001.provenance: Republic of the Philippines Government Procurement Policy Board

authority.name: Republic of the Philippines Government Procurement Policy Board

sanction.legalgrounds: Willfully or deliberately fails to execute the works in accordance with the contract or flagrantly neglects to carry out its obligations under the contract without lawful and/or just cause resulting in substantial breach thereof and due to the Contractors fault and after the contract time has expired, it has incurred a negative slippage of 100%

authority.name: Republic of the Philippines Government Procurement Policy Board

sanction.legalgrounds: Outside of force majeure, the Supplier fails to deliver or perform any or all of the goods within the period(s) specified in the contract or within any extension thereof granted by the procuring entity pursuant to a request made by the supplier prior to the delay, and such failure amounts to atleast 10% of the contract price.
